query.name: org.bucksiu.powershellpowerschool.api.students
query.sql: select s.dcid, s.City, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Comp_Info_Accep_Policy') Comp_Info_Accep_Policy, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'CT_Area') CT_Area, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'District_ID') District_ID, s.DOB, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.gender, s.grade_level, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'Horizon_LunchID') Horizon_LunchID, s.Student_Number, s.enroll_status, ps_customfields.getcf('students',s.id,'AMPM') AMPM from students s order by s.dcid
